snippet.title: STAR WARS™: Knights of the Old Republic™ II: The Sith Lords for Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the follow-up to the acclaimed original RPG STAR WARS™ Knights of the Old Republic™ in this epic story set in the darkest days of the Old Republic. 
STAR WARS™: Knights of the Old Republic™ II: The Sith Lords will be available on June 8, 2022, for Nintendo Switch. Pre-order today: either the digital product, or the digital bundle with STAR WARS™: Knights of the Old Republic™, on the Nintendo Switch eShop.

The Sith Lords Restored Content DLC will be available post-launch as free DLC in the Nintendo eShop.

You can learn more by visiting www.aspyr.com/StarWars and following Aspyr on social media.
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AspyrMedia 
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/AspyrMedia
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aspyrmedia
Follow us on IG: https://www.instagram.com/aspyrmedia/
